Applied Calculus Ch. 2 Sec. 4 Prob. 4
========================================================
```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(ScoreR)
startProblem("AC-2-4-4")
```

Give the signs of the first and second derivative for the following function.  Each derivative is either positive everywhere, zero everywhere, or negative everywhere.

#### Problem 4
```{r include=FALSE}
prob1=selectSet(name="2.4.4a", totalPts=1, "positive"=FALSE, "negative"=FALSE, "zero"=TRUE)
```
* First derivative: `r I(prob1)`
```{r include=FALSE}
prob2=selectSet(name="2.4.4b", totalPts=1, "positive"=FALSE, "negative"=FALSE, "zero"=TRUE)
```
* Second derivative: `r I(prob2)`

`r I(endProblem())`
